name: pressure

effect.scarlet_violet: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.the_teal_mask: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.legends_za: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.

short_effect: Increases the PP cost of moves targetting the Pokémon by one.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.
